function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High infection rate and asymptomatic infection of COVID-19","Impact":"Rapid spread among the population, impacting human life, economic development, and social stability","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective interventions such as quarantine measures, wearing facemasks, school closures, and large-scale testing","Technologies":"Testing and diagnostic technologies, personal protective equipment, and surveillance systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, and healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Unknown and sudden nature of the virus","Impact":"Challenges in implementing scientific and reasonable emergency policies early, leading to delayed response","Mitigation":"Investment in research and development for rapid response capabilities, international collaboration for data sharing and analysis","Technologies":"Genomic sequencing, data analytics, and international communication platforms","People":"Government agencies, research institutions, and international health organizations","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Difficulty in estimating epidemiology parameters in the early stages of the outbreak","Impact":"Challenges in understanding the dynamic transmission mechanism of COVID-19 and assessing epidemic risk level","Mitigation":"Investment in early surveillance and data collection, collaboration with international health organizations for data sharing and analysis","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, data analytics, and international communication platforms","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, and researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, and government agencies"}]}
